Swipe.display_help: A fast Claw attack that shreds your opponent.
Swipe.display_target_help: A fast Claw attack that shreds your opponent.

Strike.display_help: Claw Strike is a standard claw attack against a targeted foe.
Strike.display_target_help: Claw Strike is a standard claw attack against a targeted foe.

Slash.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Slash attack
Slash.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Slash attack

Spin.display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.
Spin.display_target_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.

Eviscerate.display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
Eviscerate.display_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special
Eviscerate.display_target_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
Eviscerate.display_target_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special

Focus.display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.
Focus.display_target_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.

Focused_Fighting.display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.
Focused_Fighting.display_target_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your Accuracy.

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your Accuracy.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Torrent.display_target_help: The Torrent has reduced your Accuracy.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Dark_Servant.display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
Dark_Servant.display_short_help: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

Blackstar.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing affected foes' Accuracy. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Blackstar.

Whirling_Hands.display_help: Launches a dizzying attack against everything in a nearby area.
Whirling_Hands.display_target_help: Launches a dizzying attack against everything in a nearby area.

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Dull_Pain.display_help: A Crey Cloned Hero can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: A Crey Cloned Hero can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Moment_of_Glory.display_help: When you activate this power, you lose almost all of your Hit Points and can no longer Regenerate Hit Points, However, you become Resistant to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long
Moment_of_Glory.display_attacker_hit: You lose most of your Hit Points, but are now practically invincible.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Enervating_Field.display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating_Field.display_target_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Radiant_Aura.display_help: You can use Radiant Aura to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced and left you helpless by an Atomic Blast.
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced and left you helpless by an Atomic Blast.

Aeon_Special.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG), +DMG, +ACC

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Lunge.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Lunge.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Impale.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Impale.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Spine_Throwing.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Spine_Throwing.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Ripper.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Ripper.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

Bash.display_help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
Bash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Bash.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Pulverize.display_help: You Pulverize with your mace dealing high Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
Pulverize.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Pulverize.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Clobber.display_help: You Clobber your foe's head in order to Disorient him. This attack does little damage on its own, but can leave most opponents Disoriented for a very long time.
Clobber.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Disorient
Clobber.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Whirling_Mace.display_help: You swing your mace in a circle all around you, attacking everyone in melee range. Your Whirling Mace deals moderate damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and has a chance to Disorient every foe you hit.
Whirling_Mace.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Whirling_Mace.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down.
Crowd_Control.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockback

Poisonous_Ray_Burst.display_help: You fire a Poisonous Ray from your mace.
Poisonous_Ray_Burst.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and your defense has been reduced.

Mace_Beam_Volley.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. Arachnos Troopers call this the Power Blast, the Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term.
Mace_Beam_Volley.display_short_help: Cone Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Mace_Beam_Blast.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. Arachnos Troopers call this the Power Blast, the Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term.
Mace_Beam_Blast.display_short_help: AoE Ranged, High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping.
Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Cocoon.display_help: Envelopes the target in a cocoon of webs. They are held helpless and unable to act.

Indomitable_Will.display_help: Activating this power greatly boosts your resistance to Sleep, Disorient, Fear and Hold effects for 90 seconds. Indomitable Will also grants a high defense to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Very Long
Indomitable_Will.display_short_help: Self Res( Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear). DEF(Psionics)
Indomitable_Will.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects.

Mind_Over_Body.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you empower your Mind Over Body to become highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage. You must have Mental Blast or Indomitable Will before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast
Mind_Over_Body.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Hide.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow and confuse effects. You are also more evasive to melee, ranged and area of effect attacks.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased.

Hide.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long
